meanings.definition: A chewy candy made from sugar or molasses.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat taffy at the fair.
meanings.sent2: The taffy was sticky and sweet.
meanings.sent3: The taffy stretched like a rubber band.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as taffy.
meanings.sent5: The taffy pulled apart like a soft cloud.

meanings.definition: Silly or foolish talk or behavior.
meanings.sent1: Their conversation was full of taffy.
meanings.sent2: Stop with the taffy and get serious.
meanings.sent3: His excuses were as thin as taffy strands.
meanings.sent4: She spun a web of taffy tales.
meanings.sent5: The taffy of his words melted away under scrutiny.
